# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Initialize an `UnsafeBufferPointer<Element>` from an `AudioBuffer`. Binds the buffer’s memory type to `Element`.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ audioBuffer: AudioBuffer)
```
title: init(_:)
